formElement.label: Rakefile location:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path to the rakefile that contains the Jasmine tasks to be executed.

formElement.label: Type of execution
formElement.documentation: Select the target to execute for the Rake invocation, either jasmine or jasmine:ci for default and Selenium modes, respectively.

formElement.label: Additional Rake Commands:
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional commands to to be entered for Rake on the Jasmine task.

formElement.label: Working directory:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the desired working directory. Leave blank to use the default workspace.
